name: Scotland Europa
goal:
Scotland Europa is a membership-based organisation that promotes Scotland's interests across the institutions of the European Union and to the representatives of Europe’s regions and Member States. We help Scottish organisations foster successful European relationships, providing guidance on European policies and funding.
Scotland Europa is also part of Scottish Enterprise - Scotland’s main economic, enterprise, innovation and investment agency. We work closely to support our colleagues in Scotland and in Scottish Development International offices across the world to enhance Scotland’s economic development and influence in Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Employment, Skills and Education
Energy, Climate change and Transport
Enterprise and Industry
Environment and Circular economy
Research and Innovation
Regional, Rural and Urban
